short_summary: The Shared Services Canada is looking to renew their annual support for EMC SAN and Fiber switches.
full_summary:
# Federal Government Tender Announcement
## Contract Title: Renewal of Annual Support for EMC SAN and Fiber Switches
### Reference: SSC-23-00023329:T
The Shared Services Canada (SSC) is soliciting proposals for the renewal of annual support for EMC SAN and Fiber switches.

### Contract Details
- **Project Reference Number**: SSC-23-00023329:T
- **Publication Date**: July 21, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: August 3, 2023, 2:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time
- **Contract Type**: Service Contract
- **Contract Category**: Goods and Services (GD)

### Contract Scope
The selected contractor will be responsible for providing annual support for EMC SAN and Fiber switches. The scope of work includes but is not limited to:

- Providing technical support for the EMC SAN and Fiber switch infrastructure
- Performing software updates and patches
- Assisting with troubleshooting and resolving issues related to the EMC SAN and Fiber switch infrastructure

### Requirements
- Bidders must be able to provide a detailed proposal outlining their approach to providing the required services
- Bidders must demonstrate their ability to meet the contract's technical requirements
- Bidders must provide a detailed breakdown of the costs associated with providing the services

### Contact Information
For any inquiries or clarifications related to this tender, please contact:

- Eleanor Cesare
- Contracting Authority
- Shared Services Canada
- eleanor.cesare@ssc-spc.gc.ca
- 613-219-8366

### Attachments
The tender document and associated attachment(s) can be found at the following link:

- [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/2140DC7C-D62B-4357-AD24-E307FD907796](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/2140DC7C-D62B-4357-AD24-E307FD907796)

**Note**: This is a request for proposal, and the closing date for submissions is August 3, 2023. Late submissions will not be accepted.
